mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (u_id, pw, name, nk_name, email, birth, phone, address, detail_address, pr_content, permission, mbti, img_path, post_time, store_name, business_id) VALUES (#{uId}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{nkName}, #{email}, #{birth}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{prContent}, #{permission}, #{mbti}, #{imgPath}, #{postTime}, #{storeName}, #{businessId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users WHERE u_id=#{uId} AND pw=#{pw}
